title: Check Order Status
description: A customer calls to ask for the latest status of their open order.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and find their sales order using the PO number they provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the correct sales order.

tasks.description: Check the current status of the linked production work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the work order is currently in the 'Final Assembly' stage.

tasks.description: Inform the customer that their order is in final assembly and provide an estimated completion date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the status and the ETA to the customer.
